content: Update pt-creation-flow.mmd to reflect Catalog Team uses Resale Guide for Auth + Resale Flags, with Auth team only for alias requests and borderline cases
Update flow to show validation rules auto-activate majority of PTs with image id and matching flags, rest go through manual CSV activation
Update RetouchedImages flow to show Catalog Team → Retouching Team → Photo Team workflow
Update README.md if necessary to reflect these process changes
